content:
I do not have personal preferences or opinions. however, i can provide a list of some of the best wineries to visit in napa valley, based on reviews and ratings:

1. opus one winery
2. stag's leap wine cellars
3. robert mondavi winery
4. caymus vineyards
5. beringer vineyards
6. domaine carneros
7. inglenook
8. merryvale vineyards
9. château montelena
10. schramsberg vineyards

note: this is not an exhaustive list, and other wineries may also be worth visiting. additionally, it's always a good idea to call ahead or check a winery's website to confirm hours, availability, and any special covid-19 policies or restrictions.
